violations.name: Missing Alt Text on Images
violations.description: Images without alt attributes or with inappropriate empty alt text

violations.name: Insufficient Color Contrast
violations.description: Text with contrast ratios below 4.5:1 (normal text) or 3:1 (large text)

violations.name: Missing Form Labels
violations.description: Form controls without programmatically associated labels

violations.name: Broken Heading Hierarchy
violations.description: Headings that skip levels or have multiple H1 elements

violations.name: Missing Keyboard Accessibility
violations.description: Interactive elements not accessible via keyboard

compliant.name: Proper Alt Text Implementation
compliant.description: Correct use of alt text for informative, decorative, and functional images

compliant.name: Sufficient Color Contrast
compliant.description: Text with contrast ratios exceeding WCAG AA/AAA requirements

compliant.name: Proper Form Labels
compliant.description: Form controls with proper programmatic labels and fieldsets

accuracyTargets.description: Minimum acceptable accuracy metrics for production deployment

notes: Test cases created based on WCAG 2.1 Level A and AA success criteria
Each violation test case contains multiple instances of the same issue type
Compliant test cases demonstrate correct implementation
Accuracy measured against axe-core as the reference scanner
Test suite should be expanded to 100+ cases for comprehensive validation
